xwikidoc.content:
## GLOBAL CLASS TRANSLATIONS ## I am pulling out many of the keys that are class based from individual translation files, such as Groups and Forms, and pulling them into this translation file. This is being done to avoid duplicate lookup strings across translation files. ## To view the different classes, go here. http://next.dev.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/CurrikiSpaceClass?editor=class ## I am also adding to this trans file elements that are used globally but not in class. Media Type roll over text for example.
## FROM GWT or XWIKI CORE loading.loading_msg=Loading, please wait... problemoccured=A problem occurred while trying to process your request. Please email webmaster@planete.sankore.org if this happens again.

collection.collection=Collection collection.folder=Folder

Todd December 31, 2008. archive.sco=Archive: sco archive.zip=Archive: zip archive.gz=Archive: gz archive.xo=Archive: xo archive.sit=Achive: sit archive.gtar=Archive: gtar archive.tar=Archive: tar audio.wav=Audio: wav audio.mp3=Audio: mp3
